original_text: And those that do pitch next unto him shall be the tribe of Issachar: and Nethaneel the son of Zuar shall be captain of the children of Issachar.
korean_text: 그 곁에 진 칠 자는 잇사갈 지파라 잇사갈 자손의 지휘관은 수알의 아들 느다넬이요

sentences.original_text: And those that do pitch next unto him
shall be the tribe of Issachar:
and Nethaneel the son of Zuar
shall be captain of the children of Issachar.
